column4: If I'm using gnome ubuntu, metacity, with compiz... where should I look for theme's? I assume compiz-themes.org, but they have sections for compiz themes, emerald themes, and metacity themes.  Should all emerald themes work?
ext5? i thought ext4 was new, and only thing new was bigger hard drive capability, like 100's of terabytes
o them i mean ext4 the new one that makes start up 2 secs
ah I didn't know, read 1 thing just talked about bigger capacity capability
